selected_quotes: The final version of Keys Under Doormats, our paper on crypto backdoors, has just been published in J.Cybersecurity.
Impossible to cover the dangers of the Feinstein-Burr bill in 140 chars. Instead, see our Keys Under Doormats paper.
No one at today's hearing seems to have read our report on tech issues with crypto backdoors, so you might as well
Most people would agree we need to reduce security risks, not make them worse, but that's what the FBI advocates.
new law enforcement requirements are likely to introduce unanticipated, hard to detect security flaws
